directions: Place ham on a rack in a foil-lined roasting pan, fat side up. Cover tightly with foil. Roast for 15 minutes per pound of ham (1 to 1 1/2 hours).
Garnish with grilled or roasted asparagus, fresh cut strawberries and fresh blueberries.
ingredients: 1 Smithfield® Hickory Smoked Spiral Sliced Ham
title: Smithfield Holiday Ham
